Maurice Ravel

Daphnis et Chloé

1909–1910 · Marnat 71 (O. 57)

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 20' 30"

  • 1. Danse gracieuse de Daphnis
  • 2. Nocturne, Interlude et Danse guerrière
  • 3. Scène de Daphnis et Chloé

This is an arrangement of three extracts from the ballet Daphnis et Chloé. Ravel also arranged two orchestral suites from the ballet and a vocal score of the whole ballet.

1. Danse gracieuse de Daphnis

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Nocturne, Interlude et Danse guerrière

Duration: 11' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5

3. Scène de Daphnis et Chloé

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 4
